title: ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is chosen
description: The ControlExampleText widget emits a beep sound when the SWT.MULTI style is selected. This behavior seems unintended.
OB: After selecting the SWT.MULTI style, clicking on other buttons also triggers the beep sound.
EB: The ControlExampleText widget should not emit any sound when the SWT.MULTI style is chosen or when interacting with other buttons.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the SWT example ControlExample. 
2. Go to the Text tab. 
3. Click on the 'Styles: SWT.SINGLE' button. 
4. Click on the 'Styles: SWT.MULTI' button again.
